name: Flow Transitions
description: Learn how to move seamlessly between different dance styles without breaking rhythm.

cards.title: Hand to Foot Sync
cards.description: Transition movements between upper and lower body flow.
bulletpoints: Use arm waves to guide foot movements
Keep shoulders relaxed for better fluidity
cards.summaryText: Blend upper and lower flow so switches ride the beat without bumps.

cards.title: Tempo Shift Adjustment
cards.description: Adjust speed and intensity smoothly to match changes in the music.
bulletpoints: Slow down or speed up movement gradually
Use pauses and accents to mark transitions
Stay aware of the music's progression
cards.summaryText: Ease through tempo shifts with measured pauses and controlled ramps.
